about_the_game:
DreamBreaker is a turn-based card-based building game with rogue.

The Demon Lord is awakening, and you must find the Demon Lord's hiding place and improve yourself as much as you can within a limited time, sealing it again before it fully regains its challenge after challenge, you collect scattered memories and find the truth of this world!

In each game, you can choose different companions and exploration routes to find different skills and items. Experience the ever-changing world of building through different combinations!

Demo

The demo contains a game experience where a team of Archer, Warrior, and Priest jointly seal demons and can be played repeatedly. Contains over 100 skills, 100 passive skills, and 30 boss battles.

The official version will contain over 10 heroes, forming more combinations and including more events, skills and enemies. Coming soon!

In each game, you can choose different companions and exploration routes to find different skills and items. Experience the ever-changing world of building through different combinations!

name: DreamBreaker Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: IGP or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: This is a demo of DreamBreaker. In this version, you will experience the game content of sealing demon together by a team of three: Archer, Warrior, and Priest
